map.string: Simple DirectMedia Layer is a cross-platform multimedia library designed to provide low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, 3D hardware via OpenGL, and 2D video framebuffer.

freeglut is a completely OpenSourced alternative to the OpenGL Utility Toolkit (GLUT) library.

glext headers define function prototypes and constants for OpenGL extensions
glh - is a platform-indepenedent C++ OpenGL helper library

GLUI is a GLUT-based C++ user interface library which provides controls such as buttons, checkboxes, radio buttons, and spinners to OpenGL applications.
Breakpad is a crossplatform library for capturing crash callstacks and runtime data.
a library for writing and using C++ mock classes

ICU is a mature, widely used set of C/C++ and Java libraries providing Unicode and Globalization support for software applications. ICU is widely portable and gives applications the same results on all platforms and between C/C++ and Java software.
ICU, permissive non-copyleft free software license
Copyright (C) 1991-2012, Thomas G. Lane, Guido Vollbeding.
JsonCpp is an implementation of a JSON (http://json.org) reader and writer in C++.
Copyright 2001, David Taubman, The University of New South Wales (UNSW)
A C++ implementation of the JPEG2000 standard
Libidn's purpose is to encode and decode internationalized domain names.

Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project.

QT cross-platform applicaiton and UI framework.

OpenAL is a cross-platform 3D audio API appropriate for use with gaming applications and many other types of audio applications.

TUT is a small and portable unit test framework for C++.
uriparser is a strictly RFC 3986 compliant URI parsing and handling library written in C. uriparser is cross-platform, fast, supports Unicode and is licensed under the New BSD license.
